name: @jliuhtonen/blu-hawaii
description: Scrobble music played on BluOS players to Last.fm

scripts.release-docker: docker buildx create --use && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t docker.io/jliuhtonen/blu-hawaii:latest -t docker.io/jliuhtonen/blu-hawaii:$npm_package_version -f Containerfile . --push
scripts.release: npm run release-npm && npm run release-docker

author: Janne Liuhtonen
